name: Superb Bug Hunt
description:
Dear Superb Bug Hunter,
first of all: welcome to the chase!

As you know, your aim is to catch 100 bugs on this small island.
We will closely follow you, and record the time you spend on your hunt.
Maybe you can get some highscores? Who knows...

Feel free to do any of these things:

Move around - by pressing the A, W, S, D keys
Jump - by pressing the SPACE bar
Catch a bug - by pressing the F key
Start a new match - by pressing the F1 key
(ESCape to end match, F8 to switch fullscreen, M to toggle ingame music)

We wish you a good hunt!

The Superb Bug Hunting Coordinators

Superb Bug Hunt v.1.0
(C) 2015 Harry Trautmann

All code, graphics and sound were done by Harry Trautmann, except

"Swosh swoosh whoosh air sound, free, high quality" by qubodup available via CC-0 at http://www.freesound.org/people/qubodup/sounds/60026/

"evening in the forest" by reinsamba available via CC-BY at http://www.freesound.org/people/reinsamba/sounds/18765/

"oceanwavescrushing" by Luftrum available via CC-BY at http://www.freesound.org/people/Luftrum/sounds/48412/

"seagulls.....waves....july08...1of4..freesond..wav" by juskiddink available via CC-BY at http://www.freesound.org/people/juskiddink/sounds/56532/

"FAKE MONKEY CHATTER 001.wav" by sandyrb available via CC-BY at http://www.freesound.org/people/sandyrb/sounds/41382/

"Affen schreit" by Bidone available via CC-0 at http://www.freesound.org/people/Bidone/sounds/67361/

"wind in tree white birch 01.wav" by klankbeeld available via CC-BY at http://www.freesound.org/people/klankbeeld/sounds/131032/

"Beating wings.wav" by juskiddink available via CC-BY at http://www.freesound.org/people/juskiddink/sounds/125940/

"Terra Amazonia" by rocavaco available via CC-SAMPLING+ at http://ccmixter.org/files/rocavaco/24638

a few effects of the "Big Environment Pack" (the water effect most prominently, I think),

and some Unity3D standard assets.

Find more great game experiments at http://metacozm.com
